summary:
A new craftable light Daedric armor, sword, dagger, bow and crossbow with/out poisonous arrows and bolts.

Available for UNP, UUNP BodySlide, CBBE, CBBE HDT, CBBE BodySlide.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1436239737.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412459723.png[/img]

The High Heels version of this armor requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels System[/url]!

For the recipes to appear in the crafting interface you need to have the [url=http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-6-1436239736.png]crafting manual[/url] in your inventory!
* Carry a lot of lockpicks! :)

In order to equip both swords on your back you need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux by Neovalen[/url].

Bodyslide files work best with the latest OS standalone version [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Ousnius and Caliente[/url].


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412462830.png[/img]
[youtube]ENaezymXV48[/youtube] [youtube]XNpmTAFBulU[/youtube]
[youtube]XZ_Hv_O2qg8[/youtube] [youtube]sYzBp73-4sc[/youtube]
Thank You!

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412459723.png[/img]

A new craftable light Daedric armor, sword, dagger, bow and crossbow with/out poisonous arrows and bolts.

Available for UNP, UUNP BodySlide, CBBE, CBBE HDT, CBBE BodySlide.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-4-1436239736.png[/img]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412459723.png[/img]

This is the thirteenth armor of the series and one of the most challenging to date. I always wanted to make a glow-ish type of armor and Nightingale seemed like a good opportunity. But to make the glow work together with the rest of the textures needed a lot of creative thinking.

If you rush to get the book don't forget to gather nirnroots from the farm because you are going to need plenty. Also bring a lot of lockpics because this loot is sealed. I hope you enjoy it! :)

The idea of this series originated from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/]Minidresses Collection mod by Tiwa44[/url] who is doing an awesome job converting some of the long dresses to mini versions.

[b]A big THANK YOU to all who donate, endorse, comment or just play using this and the previous mods![/b]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1442736357.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460420.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-6-1436239736.png[/img]
* Carry a lot of lockpicks! :)

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413848639.png[/img]

- None at the moment.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412746639.png[/img]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67806/]Celes Nightingale 7b bbp Conversion by inky84[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69709/?]MiniArmorsCollection - UNPB by gutris1[/url]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1436356130.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412746640.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url] for the HDT version.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412746640.png[/img]

Using High Heels Versions without HDT High Heels System will cause your game to crash.
Due to the many transparencies of the armors, blood spills appear in places they shouldn't.
One workaround is to use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] and set the wounds duration to a minimum.
If you are using HDT HighHeels System and you see weird numbers at the top left of your screen disable the debug info as shown below.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401335443.jpg[/img] [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1405232089.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using any mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file in the Skyrim/Data folder

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-3-1436239737.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using any mod manager
b) Manual by deleting [b]Celes Nightingale Armor.esp[/b] from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folders [b]Celes Nightingale[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ folders.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1436239737.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412460007.png[/img]

Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture by Xs2reality[/url]
Hair: KS Hairdos - 265 by Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos
ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460007.png[/img]

If you want to use any of the non vanilla meshes of this mod please credit/contact the original creators listed bellow. Anything else you can use freely at Skyrim Nexus as long as you credit my work in the comments.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412460007.png[/img]

Cuirass [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url]
Sword [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?]Warrior Within Weapons by BloodFree[/url]
Belly Piercing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20655/?]SED7 Accessoire Piercingset for CBBE3 and Bettermales by Shazhar - SED7[/url]
Stockings [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url]
High Heel Boots [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36393/?]UNP High Heels by Petrovich[/url]
Flat Boots [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15974/?]UNP Boots 01 by Petrovich[/url]

Many thanks to

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2509011/?]BloodFree[/url] for letting me use one of his awesome weapons once more!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/25154739/]NightRaid91[/url] for making the empty hood.

The team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - Without which the CBBE versions would not have been possible.

Special thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/?tb=mods&pUp=1]ousnius[/url] for all the time he has spent offering help and tips on using Outfit Studio and for making this UUNP - CBBE conversion.

TKHBMVP for the German translation! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Nexus Resources[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=298040664] Steam Resources[/url]

Bethesda that made all this possible.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1436239737.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866875.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1442736710.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439287909.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1437281401.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67595/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1436265048.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67180/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1435216507.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66967/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1434516218.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1419535175.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1416902361.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1415093656.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866635.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412409808.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58205/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410911872.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-5-1410097182.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1401343174.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53494/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401343173.jpg[/img][/url]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413852096.png[/img]
